title: ELVIRA NABIULLINA (RUSSIAN FEDERATION) | Secretary-General | United Nations

time_markers.text: Between 2003 and her September 2007 appointment as minister
quotes: Between 2003 and her September 2007 appointment as minister, Nabiullina chaired the Center for Strategic Development and an advisory committee preparing for Russia's 2006 presidency of the G8 group of nations.
